description:
I had Griffin set to work with one guy, but he got a new job and couldn't take the day off. Put that plane ticket on hold. Found another brand new model to come and do a full scene, but then two days before the shoot, he chickened out. Airfare and testing costs..etc�all lost. This shoot was beginning to get expensive!
Thankfully with Cliff local, it was easy to find a last minute replacement.
And wow! Despite this being last minute, this is one of those videos where both guys are totally into each other! I just chased them around with the cameras! This was Cliff's first full sex scene on film, so I only had to remind him to open up and let us see all the hot things he was doing to Griffin. But he clearly knows what he is doing!
Cliff is such a hot daddy that Griffin was a happy boy who loved having his throat and ass used by a dominant mature guy!
Seriously good chemistry in this video! Once again, you won't be disappointed!
title: Cliff & Griffin Barrows - RAW
